about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Gujarat based Deep Polymers Limited is a company engaged in the business of manufacturing color and additive masterbatches including antifab fillers, transparent fillers and color fillers etc. The products are used in engineering plastics and compounds and are cost-effective replacements for polymers.

The company started its facility at Ahmedabad to manufacture plastic masterbatches with 600 MT productions per annum in the year 1992. Today, it has achieved production of color masterbatches and filler masterbatches of 12,000 MT and 25,000 MT respectively.

Deep Polymer's total revenues, as restated for the year ended March 31, 2018, is Rs. 4,110.09 Lakh. The
The company's restated net profit after tax for the year ending March 31, 2018, is Rs. 214.73 Lakh.

faqs.question: What is the Deep Polymers Limited?
faqs.answer:
Deep Polymers Limited is a SME IPO of 3810000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on August 8, 2018, and closes on August 13, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Deep Polymers Limited through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Deep Polymers Limited using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Deep Polymers Limited by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Deep Polymers Limited through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Deep Polymers Limited' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Deep Polymers Limited will open?
faqs.answer: The Deep Polymers Limited opens on August 8, 2018 and closes on August 13, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Deep Polymers Limited?
faqs.answer: Deep Polymers Limited lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Deep Polymers Limited?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Deep Polymers Limited online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
